::: contentWrapper
# Detecting and connecting to vehicles {#detecting-and-connecting-to-vehicles .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

This FAQ provides some troubleshooting for when you are unable to detect
a vehicle, connect to it or stay connected to it.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Sections

**[Basics](#h_128290321271531736953465) \|\| 
[Troubleshooting](#h_758511241471531736958970) \|\|  [Other
tips](#h_149687541691531736970201)**
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Basics

Please verify the following which influence successful connectivity:

-   Check you are using a **[compatible
    device](//support.digitaldreamlabs.com/article/255-compatible-devices-anki-overdrive-fast-furious-edition)**
-   Check the OVERDRIVE app or the OVERDRIVE: Fast & Furious Edition app
    is updated to the latest version
-   Move away from any potential sources of interference including:
    -   microwave ovens
    -   Direct Satellite Service (DSS)
    -   external power sources (chargers or power inverters)
    -   wireless devices that operate in the 2.4 GHz or 5 GHz radio
        frequencies
    -   wireless RF video
    -   wireless speakers
    -   some external monitors and LCD displays
-   **[Charge your
    vehicles](//support.digitaldreamlabs.com/article/267-charging-vehicles-and-battery-life)**
    fully. Vehicles will not connect or may disconnect if they have low
    battery
-   Check you are in the correct tab in-app for selecting a Supercar or
    Supertruck
    -   hint: If you are using X52 ICE, you need to play a game before
        he is visible in the Garage

![Screenshot_2018-07-16-11-38-35.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d77482c7d3a7e9ae9e3d6/img-4276-1585280685-1688855568.png){width="402"
height="226"} ![Screenshot_2018-07-16-11-38-24.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d77492c7d3a7e9ae9e3d7/img-4276-1585280685-1504328326.png){width="402"
height="226"}
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Troubleshooting

-   Check Bluetooth is turned on on your device
-   If your device's OS version is Android 6 or higher, **[turn on
    location
    services](//support.digitaldreamlabs.com/article/274-enabling-location-services)**
-   [Turn the vehicle off and on
    again](//support.digitaldreamlabs.com/article/283-how-do-i-turn-off-my-vehicle)
-   Force close the app and any other running apps and processes
-   Restart your device
-   Toggle airplane mode on and off
-   Relaunch the app
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Other tips 

-   If you are playing against Commanders / other players, have the
    Commander / other player select their vehicle first

![Screenshot_2018-07-16-11-47-57.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d774a04286364bc975ca7/img-4276-1585280685-2114485893.png){width="459"
height="258"}
:::
